issue.title: Atlas robot collapse to 0,0,0 when a collision is done again first step in Q3

content.raw:
Hmm I think I did a while ago, but maybe that was with the workaround of removing the fdir1 tag from the feet. I'll try again. :)

UPDATE: just tried again with ``fdir1`` branch + teleop in ``short_walk_sequence2`` and it didn't explode upon contact.
content.html:
Hmm I think I did a while ago, but maybe that was with the workaround of removing the fdir1 tag from the feet. I'll try again. :)

UPDATE: just tried again with fdir1 branch + teleop in short_walk_sequence2 and it didn't explode upon contact.
